metadata.jobDescription:
Product Manager, Business AI — advancing Business AI Agents across WhatsApp,
Messenger, and Facebook/Instagram ads. Serving 200M+ businesses globally.
Requires 8+ years PM experience, AI/agents production experience, B2B focus.

hero.status: Open to PM roles — Business AI, Platform Infrastructure, B2B Products
hero.subheadline: Technical Product Manager. Eight years shipping B2B infrastructure—from enterprise blockchain at Microsoft to institutional crypto serving Galaxy and ETF providers. Deployed AI in production at Dapper Labs.

about.tagline: Eight years shipping B2B products where complexity meets scale—from enterprise blockchain to APIs serving millions of daily requests to AI-powered developer tools.
bio:
Most recently I was at Anchorage Digital, shipping infrastructure for institutional B2B clients—Galaxy, ETF providers, asset managers. Before that I drove 15× revenue growth at Ankr by pivoting our API platform to B2B protocol partnerships (Polygon, Arbitrum, Avalanche). At Dapper Labs I shipped an AI support agent handling 1,000+ questions weekly with 98% accuracy—my first production AI deployment.
I started at Microsoft building Xbox royalties on Ethereum—B2B infrastructure serving game publishers like Ubisoft. Eight years in, I've shipped APIs, SDKs, and platforms for enterprise customers who can't afford downtime. I know how to navigate 0-to-1 ambiguity (co-founded Mempools) and I know how to ship at scale (2.7B Xbox consumers).

caseStudies.reasoning: B2B pivot driving 15× revenue growth—directly demonstrates ability to grow business-facing products and find PMF
Enterprise B2B infrastructure at Microsoft scale (2.7B consumers)—shows ability to ship for large business ecosystems
Institutional B2B clients (Galaxy, ETF providers)—demonstrates enterprise customer focus and compliance navigation
0-to-1 founder experience—directly relevant to navigating ambiguity in new product development
